name: Lukewarm Tea Fnaf Test
description:
Got Bored. Attempted to challenge myself by making a fnaf game with the free version of construct 3, in which I am limited to 40 lines of code. This was the result. The game was made over the course of less than 24 hours so I am actually pretty proud that I was able to figure this out in that little time.  Actual Sprites coming soon. Feedback very welcome... please.

Controls:

Pressing Down Space - Looking at Cameras

Tap A - Close/Open Right door

Tap D - Close/Open Left door
